title: TEMPLATE 3 sheets of miniature travel booklets, maps, postcards, stickers | PDF
description: 3 sheets A4 of mini travel brochure templates, maps, postcards, and stickers. The book is designed for paper weight 80 gsm. Examples were printed on self-adhesive photo paper with a density of 80 g/m2 in the mode for printing photographs with the highest quality on an inkjet printer. If you use thicker paper, there is a chance that the book will not close. Therefore, I recommend that you use a hair straightening iron. Please note that the templates are made in 1:12 scale andâ€¦
